name: MUSCA
description:
Story

The raw materials on earth are coming to an end and wars between all countries have been raging for years. In order to bring the situation back under control, a system has been developed in the last decades with enormous research funds of the united nations, with which it is possible to search for new materials in distant galaxies.

You are part of a team of scientists that is collecting data in the Musca Cloud, but in the process you come across something unexpected...
